question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. skateboard
B. white tent
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The white tent is clearly positioned in the background behind the skateboarder and the immediate foreground elements, making its depth relationship obvious without needing a depth map.
